Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class GameSetupController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GameSetupController
public class GameSetupController
extends java.lang.Object
Handles the interaction between client and server during the phase of choosing the God Cards to use for the Game. The Player can choose to randomize the playable God Cards pool, or to choose the God Cards that will be used in the Game.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  GameSetupController.GodImageView
    Represents each God Card as an ImageView with an associated boolean attribute telling if the Card was clicked or not.

    • chooseYesNo

      public void chooseYesNo​(java.lang.String query)
      Allows the Player to choose between randomizing the playable God Cards pool or selecting the God Cards to use.
      Parameters:
      query - the "yes or no question" the Player should answer to

    • displayGameInfo

      public void displayGameInfo()
      Allows preparing the scene for the choice of the Cards.

    • chooseMyCard

      public void chooseMyCard​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> possibleCards, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> pickedCards)
      Allows the Player to choose his own Card between those available to pick. When he selected his Card, he will be able to click on the Confirm button.
      Parameters:
      possibleCards - an ArrayList containing all the God names associated to the available Cards
      pickedCards - an ArrayList containing all the God names associated to the already picked Cards

    • chooseAllCards

      public void chooseAllCards​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> possibleCards, int num)
      Allows the Player to choose a specified number of Cards between those available. The Player can scroll through all Cards to select the 2 or 3 Cards to use for the Game. When he selected the expected number of cards, he will be able to click on the Confirm button.
      Parameters:
      possibleCards - an ArrayList containing all the God names associated to the available Cards
      num - the number of cards to choose
